manifestDescription.message: Read RSS news while surfing the web

news_httpsBlockingWarningText.message: My apologize. This extension can't work as you're at website '{0}' which is served in a secure connection (e.g. the website url starts with 'https://...'). Kindly to switch to any browser tab which opens a normal website (url starts with 'http://...') and then launch the extension again
